nodes.text: The Life Day Revelers were a group of Life Day celebrants active during the Galactic War. Around 3638 BBY, they tried to promote their holiday in the Sith Empire, the authorities of which regarded them as subversive nonconformists. That year, they were accidentally authorized to peddle their goods and display their cheerful demeanor on Vaiken Spacedock, a space station maintainedby the Empire, which prompted the issuing of the Imperial Edict GR-1NC4, a legal text that deemed all trade with the Life Day Revelers illicit.
